title: Understanding Sorting Orders
text: When sorting data, we can arrange it in different orders. One common way is to start with the smallest or earliest value and move to the largest or latest value. This is known as sorting in ascending order.

title: Identifying Ascending Order
text: In ascending order, numbers are arranged from the smallest to the largest, dates from the earliest to the most recent, and words alphabetically from A to Z.

title: Choosing the Correct Sorting Order
text: Given the options, which one represents sorting from the smallest to the largest, earliest to most recent, or alphabetically from A to Z?
